aranawithana mahatha meheyawana nawa arahadi pahan pujawa 9.00 sita rapawahini thulin bauddha wehera wiharasthana narambaima.aluyama 5.30 kiripidu danaya sahitha perahara, aluyama 6.30 sita 7.30 dakwa uposhatha ashtanga silaya samadan karawima, keti anushasanawa saha maithri bhawanawa sidukirima, dharmayathanadhipathi na himi, perawaru 8.30 – 9.30 bhawanawa wandurambaa nyanaloka himi, 9.30 – 10.30 dharmadeshanaya aasiri rajapaksha mahatha, 10.30 – 11.00 kawyamaya dharma deshanawa hanguranketha nyaninda podi hamuduruwan, 11.00 dawala sambuddha pujawa dampahala nyanasudhira himi, paswaru 12.30 – 1.30 gihi deshanaya aacharya pi්rathi kulathunga mahatha, 1.30 – 2.00 sakman bhawanawa dharmayathanadhipathi na himi, 2.00 – 3.00 jathaka katha deshanawa shasthrapathi nimal amarawansha mahatha, 3.00 – 4.00 dharma deshanawa kathikacharya dampahala rahula himi, 4.00 – 5.00 mahapirith deshanawa sahitha maha samaya suthra deshanawa dharmayathanaye swamin wahansela, 5.00 ta ashtapana sahitha samma sambuddha atawisi gilanpasa bodhi pujawa, dharmayathanadhipathi na himi.perawaru 5.30 – 6.30 kiripindu pujawa shila samadanaya ha anushasanawa mirahawaththe panynyasiri himi, 8.00 – 8.30 bhawanawa 8.30 – 9.30 dharma deshanawa mirahawaththe panynyasiri himi, 9.30 – 10.30 dharma deshanawa thalgamuwe sudhirananda himi, 10.30 – 11.00 dethis wyanjana sahitha sambuddha pujawa, 12.15 – 1.00 dhammachakka pawaththana suthra deshanawa, 1.00 – 2.00 dharma sakachchawa makulawe sudassana himi, 2.30 – 3.30 dharma deshanawa thalalle chandakiththi himi, 3.30 – 4.30 dharma deshanawa gampaha mahanama himi, 5.00 karaniya meththa suthra deshanawa ha sil pawaranaya.perawaru 6.00 – 7.00 sila samadanaya saha anushasanaya aacharya mirisse dhammika nahimi, 7.00 – 7.30 theruwan wandanawa, 8.00 – 9.30 bhawanawa aacharya mirisse dhammika na himi, 9.30 – 11.00 dharmadeshanaya aacharya mirisse dhammika nahimi, 11.00 – 11.30 theruwan wandanawa paswaru 12.30 – 1.00 suthra sajjhayanawa aluthwawa dhammasathi himi, 1.00 – 2.00 dharmadeshanawa iguruwaththe dhammagaweshi himi, 2.00 – 3.30 dharma sakachchawa shasthrapathi thalpathwawa saddhathissa mahimi, 4.00 – 5.00 dharmadeshanaya habarakada indarathana nahimi, 5.00 – 6.00 dharmadeshanaya dalugama samithanyana himi, rathri 7.00 atawisi buddha wandanawa.pun poho dinawala anuradhapura jaya shri maha bodhi wiharasthanayata pehewas samadan wimata paminena sadahawathun sandaha pinkam anuradhapura atamasthanadhipathi saha uthuru madhyama disawe pradhana sanghanayaka aacharya pallegama siriniwasa nahimiyange anushasana paridi pawathwe.edina dharmadeshana, dharma sakachcha, bhawana, buddha puja saha bodhi puja da athulath we.

ee sandaha yam digu kalina ha karyakshama wada piliwelak awashya bawa wathman mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma pa්ramukha rajaya thiranaya kara atha.2004 sunami wyasanayath samangama sumatha්ra dupath pa්radeshawala bhumikampa bahulawa siduwimath, ratata dakunu desin nawa bhu wibhedhana mayimak wardhanaya wimath nisa ape maha weli pilibanda biyak sakayak rate ka atharath pana nangi thibini.ee anuwa rajaya ha aapada kalamanakarana anshath, mahawali adhikariyath ee pilibandawa awadhanaya yomukara weli aarakshana wyapruthiyak pilibandawa sankalpa warthawak 2005 di loka bankuwata idiripath karana ladi.
